name: photo-of-the-day-september-4-2009-feel-good-friday
title: Photo Of The Day: September 4, 2009 [Feel Good Friday]
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: We can't wait to get out to the Nashville Zoo to see the adorable and rare clouded leopard cubs the debuted this week. Thanks to Christian Sperka for sending
contentEncoded:
We can’t wait to get out to the Nashville Zoo to see the adorable and rare clouded leopard cubs the debuted this week. Thanks to Christian Sperka for sending this one our way. TGIF!

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
